ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Surefall Glade and the Bears
ygData.msgSnippet: But that way you wont know where static mobs are spawned (those that usaly kills you) =P
ygData.messageBody:
But that way you wont know where static mobs are spawned (those that usaly
kills you) =P

> mobs.
>
> Mu
